sentences.sentence: The value of Japan, Britain and Dutch increase between 2010 and 2012; while America decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012.

sentences.sentence: The value of Japan, Britain and Dutch increase between 2010 and 2012; while America decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012.
